src:
Jembatan di Montigo Resorts Batam Roboh, Sejumlah WNA Dilarikan ke RS
07 Nov 2019, 19:00 by Agus Siswanto
Jakarta - Jembatan di area Montigo Resorts Batam roboh. Sejumlah WNA dilarikan ke rumah sakit.
"(Jembatan roboh) di Montigo Resorts," ujar Kabid Humas Polda Kepulauan Riau (Kepri) Kombes S Erlangga saat dimintai konfirmasi, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Jembatan roboh saat 10 WNA Malaysia berfoto. Diduga struktur jembatan di area Montigo Resorts, Jl Hang Lekiu, Sambau, ini tidak kuat menahan beban.
"Jembatannya tidak kuat," sambungnya.
Dari informasi yang dihimpun, WNA yang terjatuh dari jembatan Montigo Resorts ada yang dibawa ke RS Bhayangkara.

(fdn/fdn)
text:
Bridge in Montigo Resorts Batam Collapsed, a Number of Foreign Citizens Deprived to Hospital
Nov 7 2019, 19:00 by Agus Siswanto
Jakarta - The bridge in the Montigo Resorts Batam area collapsed. A number of foreigners were rushed to the hospital.
"(Bridge collapsed) at Montigo Resorts," said Head of Riau Islands Police Public Relations (Kepri) Kombes S Erlangga when asked for confirmation, Thursday (11/07/2019).
The bridge collapsed when 10 Malaysian foreigners took pictures. It is suspected that the bridge structure in the Montigo Resorts area, Jl Hang Lekiu, Sambau, is not strong enough to withstand the load.
"The bridge is not strong," he continued.
From the information gathered, foreigners who fell from the Montigo Resorts bridge were taken to the Bhayangkara Hospital.

(fdn / fdn)
